name: Bangladesh Investment Summit 2025
shortDescription: Bangladesh Investment Summit 2025 brings business minds, investors, and leaders together to talk about future chances in areas like AI, banking tech, and green power. With talks, startup ideas, and meet-ups, this event helps build new ideas and business ties in Bangladesh. It’s an excellent opportunity for anyone looking to network and expand their knowledge about the future of these industries.

name: Chittagong Street Art Festival
shortDescription: The Chittagong Street Art Festival is a bright show of city art. Watch streets turn into live walls of paint, with murals, spray art, and fun setups. Artists use colors to share ideas, stories, and local pride through each line and dot of their work. It’s a vibrant celebration of creativity and urban culture that you won’t want to miss, full of energy and beautiful expressions of art.

name: Dhaka International Folk Fest
shortDescription: Dhaka International Folk Fest is a music night full of heart and soul, showing off the deep songs and tunes of village life. Hear famous folk singers under the stars, with tasty local foods and hand-made goods for a full feel of Bengali culture. It’s a celebration of tradition, with incredible music and a chance to experience the spirit of rural Bengal in the heart of Dhaka.

name: Bangladesh International Tech Expo 2024
shortDescription: Bangladesh International Tech Expo 2024 brings new ideas to life, as young startups show smart tools to a group of experts, funders, and mentors. With live talks, votes, and fast advice, the event helps young teams grow and get real chances to shine. It’s an exciting event for tech lovers and entrepreneurs looking to explore the future of technology and innovation in Bangladesh.

name: Rajshahi Food & Flavor Festival
shortDescription: The Rajshahi Food & Flavor Festival is a tasty trip through local meals. Try dishes from 50+ food stalls, from sweets to spicy rice plates. With riverside views, eating games, and live chefs, it’s a great treat for people who love good food. The festival promises to delight your taste buds with the freshest local flavors and unforgettable culinary experiences.

name: Photography Masterclass with GMB Akash
shortDescription: This top photo class with famous artist GMB Akash will teach you how to tell stories with pictures. Learn how to show feeling, life, and color in your shots. Get tips, photo checks, and live help—perfect for those who want to get better at photos. Whether you’re just starting or have some experience, this workshop will help you capture moments that tell powerful stories with every shot.
